content: astrid lindgren 1907-2002 and ilon wikland 1930- worked together on a number of classical children s books written by astrid and illustrated by ilon the work of astrid lindgren is unique and significant and her books have been translated to more than 100 languages and sold in more than 165 million copies around the world astrid lindgren and ilon wikland began their collaboration in the mid-1950s at the publishing house rabén & sjögren together they created a magical world that has touched generations of readers and ensured that astrid lindgren s stories continue to be loved all over the world järbo has now been granted the opportunity to create a unique collection of yarns and knitting kits with some of the most beloved children s books characters as inspiration illustrations © design ilon wikland ab the children of noisy village karlsson on the roof lotta on troublemaker street madicken seacrow island ronja the robber s daughter tm and © the astrid lindgren company ***we are happy to be able to share our patterns with you for free unfortunately we are not able to answer dm s here on ravelry however we hope you will like the pattern and will enjoy seeing your project come to life *** **inspiration and free patterns** follow järbo on instagram 1 **reseller map** jarbo se 2 - brand website in swedish find a reseller 3 - nordic region in swedish **our official online stores** eddna se 4 eddna no 5 eddna de 6 eddna at 7 eddna nl 8 eddna be 9 järbo is a swedish brand established in 1896 we offer nordic design selected yarns and accessories in stores and online 1 https //www instagram com/jarbogarn/ 2 https //www jarbo se/ 3 https //www jarbo se/hitta-butik 4 https //www eddna se/ 5 https //www eddna no/ 6 https //www eddna de/ 7 https //www eddna at/ 8 https //www eddna nl/ 9 https //www eddna be/
